name: I Build It
description: Plans for jigs and homemade tools, as well as a ton of useful guides and tips.

name: The Wood Database
description: Information and statistics for hundreds of species of wood.

name: The Stanley Bench Plane Page
description: A plethora of practical information on restoring and using vintage Stanley hand planes, along with a handy dating flowchart.

name: Sharpening Handbook
description: Thorough instructions and diagrams for sharpening tool blades.

name: Chime Design and Build
description: Everything you need to know about making a set of wind chimes.

name: 70birds
description: Free plans for birdhouses; specific to North American species.

name: Woodgears.ca
description: Engineering-focused guides and techniques; also offers plans for jigs, homemade tools, and more.

name: WoodArchivist
description: Free plans, scanned from woodworking magazines.

name: Paul Sellers' Workbench Info Page
description: A master craftsman's guide to creating a workbench. Offers free plans and build guides, as well as well-established concepts and rules of thumb to have in mind when designing and building your own workbench.

name: Patrick's Blood & Gore
description: An extremely-detailed study of most every plane Stanley ever made.

name: Lost Art Press
description: My personal favorite resource for anything related to wood. Excellent books, and a wonderful blog.

name: The Barn on White Run
description: Don Williams' blog; a wealth of knowledge on woodworking, homesteading, craftsmanship, construction, and the like.

name: Pask Makes
description: Craftsman Neil Pask's YouTube channel. Homemade tools, furniture, and art. Possibly the most patient man on Earth.

name: Workshop Companion
description: Author and craftsman Nick Engler's YouTube channel. Plans, techniques, jigs, homemade finishes, and much more.

name: The Instrument Makers
description: Excellent video-format interviews, shop tours, and information about the making of fine instruments.

name: Hyperkitten Tool Company
description: Vintage and modern tools at excellent prices. New tools posted multiple times per week.
